c4:
Connect 4 is a classic two-player strategy game where the goal is to be the first to get four of your own colored discs in a row — either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

    Gameplay:
  • Players take turns dropping one disc at a time into any of the 7 columns.
  • A disc always falls to the lowest available space in the column.
  • You can’t place a disc in a full column.
c3:
Connect 3 is a classic two-player strategy game where the goal is to be the first to get three of your own colored discs in a row — either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

    Gameplay:
  • Players take turns dropping one disc at a time into any of the 4 columns.
  • A disc always falls to the lowest available space in the column.
  • You can’t place a disc in a full column.
